title: Respond to a Negative Product Review
description: A customer has left a 1-star review for a product on the website. A customer service agent needs to respond.

tasks.description: Receive a notification about a new low-rated product review.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent is alerted to the negative feedback.

tasks.description: Review the customer's comment to understand the issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent understands the reason for the customer's dissatisfaction.

tasks.description: Post a public reply to the review, apologizing for the issue and providing contact information for customer service to resolve the problem directly.
tasks.expected_outcome: A helpful and empathetic response is posted, showing other customers that the company addresses issues.
